title: Can't login
body: I can't log in to the merchandise store to check my order nor the updated client, it says an error occurred for the store and it says i'm unable to join in the login queue for the client, but when I go to the legacy client I can log in without a problem. I don't know why it isn't letting me log in at all.

replies.body: Are you able to access the client's store through the legacy client after logging in?  Are you using any language packs on the updated client hat's not supported for your region?  Let me know, as that might help determine what's causing this.

The in-client store I can access, but I can't get to the merchandise store on the site and I'm not using anything like that at all. 

When I try to log in to the merchandise store it just says "an error occurred" and when I try to log in to the updated client it just says "unable to join the login to the queue. check the status here"
